oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crises - The Negro's Role in American History
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African Americans; race relations;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: September 29, 1968 edition of "The Kansas City Star," aimed at describing the positive impact African Americans have had on the development of the United States.
